subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. fined Jason Kidd $20,000 on Wednesday for publicly criticizing the officials who worked the Nets’ 92-91 loss to the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday.
snippet: The N.B.A. fined Jason Kidd $20,000 on Wednesday for publicly criticizing the officials who worked the Nets’ 92-91 loss to the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday.
